message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a regularization framework for semi-supervised learning using adversarial transformations. The paper focuses on image classification tasks and uses CIFAR-10 and SVHN datasets for experiments. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the robustness of the proposed method against input perturbations, which suggests the possibility of attacks on the model, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a likely sub-category as well. Finally, the paper uses neural networks for implementation, which makes cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) a possible sub-category.
